samples.context: Symptoms to help in finding out that the baby is sick are: (i) continuous crying (ii) drooping of eyes (iii) redness of eyes (iv) high temperature of body.
samples.question: What are some symptoms of illness in babies?

samples.context: Signs which help to indicate the sickness in baby (i) loose motions, stomach pain indicate diarrhoea. (ii) high fever, headache, muscular pain, feeling of shivering and cold indicate malaria.
samples.question: What signs may indicate a baby has diarrhoea?

samples.context: Doctors suggest for laboratory tests, if there is fever with no other symptoms to find out the kind of sickness.
samples.question: When do doctors suggest laboratory tests for babies?
